attribute.description: Basal area weighted stand age based on field recorded or modeled ages of dom/codom trees
attribute.short_description: BA weighted stand age based on dom/codom trees

attribute.description: Basal area weighted stand age based on field recorded or modeled ages of dom/codom trees excluding remnant trees
attribute.short_description: BA weighted stand age based on dom/codom trees (no remnants)

attribute.description: Basal area weighted stand age based on field recorded ages of dom/codom conifers
attribute.short_description: BA weighted stand age based on dom/codom conifers

attribute.description: Basal area weighted stand age based on field recorded ages of dominant and codominant hardwoods
attribute.short_description: BA weighted stand age based on dom/codom hardwoods

attribute.description: Canopy cover of all live trees: calculated using methods in the Forest Vegetation Simulator for Inventory plots; sum of occular estimates for Ecology plots
attribute.short_description: Canopy cover of all live trees

attribute.description: Canopy cover of all conifers: calculated using methods in the Forest Vegetation Simulator for Inventory plots; sum of occular estimates for Ecology plots
attribute.short_description: Canopy cover of all conifers

attribute.description: Canopy cover of all hardwoods: calculated using methods in the Forest Vegetation Simulator for Inventory plots; sum of occular estimates for Ecology plots
attribute.short_description: Canopy cover of all hardwoods

attribute.description: Canopy cover of all dominant trees (i.e. CROWN_CLASS >= 3); calculated using methods in the Forest Vegetation Simulator
attribute.short_description: Canopy cover of all dominant trees

attribute.description: Number of tree canopy layers present
attribute.short_description: Number of tree canopy layers present

attribute.description: Forest type, which describes dominant tree species (based on basal area) of current vegetation. Alpha code comprised of one or two hyphenated species codes (from 2000 PLANTS database).
attribute.short_description: Forest type (based on dominance of basal area)

attribute.description: Forest type, which describes dominant tree species (based on foliar cover) of current vegetation. Alpha code comprised of one or two hyphenated species codes (from 2000 PLANTS database).
attribute.short_description: Forest type (dominant tree species (based on foliar cover) of current vegetation)

attribute.description: Forest type, which describes dominant tree species (based on importance value) of current vegetation. Alpha code comprised of one or two hyphenated species codes (from 2000 PLANTS database).
attribute.short_description: Forest type (dominant tree species (based on importance value) of current vegetation)

attribute.description: Importance value of conifers based on basal area and TPH ratios
attribute.short_description: Importance value of all conifers

attribute.description: Importance value of hardwoods based on basal area and TPH ratios
attribute.short_description: Importance value of all hardwoods

attribute.description: Importance value of trees <12.5 cm DBH based on basal area and TPH ratios
attribute.short_description: Importance value of trees < 12.5 cm dbh

attribute.description: Importance value of trees >=100 cm DBH based on basal area and TPH ratios
attribute.short_description: Importance value of trees >=100 cm dbh

attribute.description: Basal-area weighted mean diameter of all live trees
attribute.short_description: Basal-area weighted mean diameter of all live trees

attribute.description: Basal-area weighted mean diameter of all live conifers
attribute.short_description: Basal-area weighted mean diameter of all live conifers

attribute.description: Basal-area weighted mean diameter of all live hardwoods
attribute.short_description: Basal-area weighted mean diameter of all live hardwoods

attribute.description: Quadratic mean diameter of trees >=2.5 cm dbh
attribute.short_description: Quadratic mean diameter of trees >=2.5 cm dbh

attribute.description: Quadratic mean diameter of conifers >=2.5 cm dbh
attribute.short_description: Quadratic mean diameter of conifers >=2.5 cm dbh

attribute.description: Quadratic mean diameter of hardwoods >=2.5 cm dbh
attribute.short_description: Quadratic mean diameter of hardwoods >=2.5 cm dbh

attribute.description: Quadratic mean diameter of all dominant and codominant trees
attribute.short_description: Quadratic mean diameter of all dom/codom trees

attribute.description: Quadratic mean diameter of all dominant and codominant conifers
attribute.short_description: Quadratic mean diameter of all dominant and codominant conifers

attribute.description: Quadratic mean diameter of all dominant and codominant hardwoods
attribute.short_description: Quadratic mean diameter of all dominant and codominant hardwoods

attribute.description: Quadratic mean diameter in inches of trees whose heights are in the top 25% of all tree heights on the plot
attribute.short_description: Quadratic mean diameter of the top 25% of trees by height

attribute.description: Late successional old growth: 1 if CANCOV_CON >= 10% and QMDC_DOM >= 50.8; 0 otherwise
attribute.short_description: Late successional old growth

attribute.description: Late successional old growth: 1 if TPHC_GE_50 >= 57.0; 0 otherwise
attribute.short_description: Late successional old growth

attribute.description: Regionalized old-growth structure index for plots within NWFP. Calculated from abundance of large live trees, snags and down wood, and diversity of tree sizes.
attribute.short_description: Old-growth structure index

attribute.description: 1 if OGSI exceeds threshold for 80 year old stand; 0 otherwise
attribute.short_description: 1 if OGSI exceeds threshold for 80 year old stand; 0 otherwise

attribute.description: 1 if OGSI exceeds threshold for 200 year old stand; 0 otherwise
attribute.short_description: 1 if OGSI exceeds threshold for 200 year stand; 0 otherwise

attribute.description: Richness (count) of all tree species
attribute.short_description: Richness (count) of all tree species

attribute.description: Richness (count) of conifer tree species
attribute.short_description: Richness (count) of conifer tree species

attribute.description: Richness (count) of hardwood tree species
attribute.short_description: Richness (count) of hardwood tree species

attribute.description: Diameter diversity index. DDI is a measure of the structural diversity of a forest stand, based on tree densities in different DBH classes.
attribute.short_description: Diameter diversity index

attribute.description: Cover class, based on CANCOV, modified slightly from O'Neil et al. (2001)
attribute.short_description: Cover class (modified) from O'Neil et al. 2001

attribute.description: Size class, based on QMD_DOM and CANCOV, modified slightly from O'Neil et al. (2001)
attribute.short_description: Size class (modified) from O'Neil et al. (2001)

attribute.description: Structural condition (lumping of Johnson et al.'s (2001) SIZECL and COVCL), used in Ohmann and Waddell (2002)
attribute.short_description: Structural condition (after Ohmann and Waddell (2002))

attribute.description: Structural condition (lumping of SC classes), used in the DecAID Decayed Wood Advisor (Marcot et al. 2010) (http://www.fs.fed.us/r6/nr/wildlife/decaid/)
attribute.short_description: Structural condition (DecAID lumping of SC)

attribute.description: Structural condition (lumping of O'Neil et al. (2001) SIZECL and COVCL)
attribute.short_description: Structural condition (O'Neil et al. 2001)

attribute.description: Structural condition (STRUCCOND plus remnant classes -- for CLAMS EcoApp analyses)
attribute.short_description: Structural condition plus remnant classes

attribute.description: Vegetation class based on CANCOV, BAH_PROP, QMD_DOM
attribute.short_description: Vegetation class based on CANCOV, BAH_PROP, QMD_DOM

code.description: Broadleaf, sap/pole, mod/closed (CANCOV >= 40, BAH_PROP >= 0.65, QMD_DOM < 25 cm )
code.label: Blf - Sm
